resources.string: This is JAM project. We created this project for our second year Java course.
Hi, I\'m am currently studying CSE at HSTU. Developing this project was so much fun and I learned a lot. I also like to think that good code is like an art.
This is Jannatul Ferdouse, undergraduate student at CSE department of HSTU. From my passion I have taken this project as a challenge to do develop something great.
This is Mahadi Hasan, undergraduate student at CSE department of HSTU. In this project I was a cooperative member. From my passion I have taken this as a challenge to get bright performance.
